item.title: Saakashvili handed further four years in jail
item.description: The former president of Georgia has been imprisoned since 2021 when he returned to the country.

item.title: Taiwan revokes visa of pro-Beijing Chinese influencer
item.description: The woman has attracted criticism over videos calling for the unification of Taiwan with mainland China.

item.title: 'I had one child and I lost him' - North Macedonia mourns nightclub disaster
item.description: Fifty-nine people have been killed following a fire at a nightclub in North Macedonia.

item.title: Fresh US strikes in Yemen with 53 now dead, Houthis say
item.description: The US said it launched a "decisive and powerful" wave of air strikes on Houthi targets on Saturday.

item.title: Forever 21 files for bankruptcy in the US
item.description: US stores will remain open as Forever 21's operating company "begins its process of "winding down".
